name: EASIMEN
short_description: EASIMEN (Embodied Agent SIMulation ENvironment) is intended to be a flexible easy-to-use (EASI-) AI sandbox supporting not only single but multi-agent simulations of embodied agents (-MEN). Uses Ogre3D for graphics, OpenDE for physics, BIAR for AI.
